column1: Table A-180:  Methane Emissions by State from Livestock Manure Management for 2019 (kt) a,b
a Accounts for CH4 reductions due to capture and destruction of CH4 at facilities using anaerobic digesters.

b Disaggregated animal type (E.g., Beef on Feedlots or Dairy Heifer animal types) methane emissions were not estimated by state for the current (1990 through 2019) Inventory. Disaggregated animal types will be estimated for the next (1990 through 2020) Inventory submission.
